spotifier.spotify.client_id.desc: The Client ID of your Spotify app (Follow instructions on the Spotifier wiki)
spotifier.spotify.pull_rate.desc:
How many milliseconds to wait before pulling data from Spotify's servers
§4WARNING - SETTING THIS TO A VALUE TOO LOW FOR EXTENDED PERIODS MIGHT GET YOU RATE LIMITED/IP BLOCKED BY SPOTIFY (For safe usage, keep above 1100).
